name: Lighthouse (PoolGamesTM)
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would feel like, to, well, you know how in dreams stuff scare you more than they would in the real world? In this piece of land by Sam's Lighthouse, that will happen. It would be scary in a dream.

Join Sam in his light house, maybe take a visit to Georges Storages (im bad at making store names), visit a weird fellow in the sewers, and race Wacky around his tire!

This game is a demo, so here are the bugs I noticed (if you find one i did not, comment the bug)

You can clip through walls and fall through the map, dont ram into walls please.

If you go behind a sign by a bush, you clip out of the map, dont touch signs.

If you get on Flick (keep on reading to figure out who that is) you can fly out of the map and skip a whole half of the game by going to Wackys race.

The wall that has a button behind it in the sewers is a quad from unity, so its transparent on one side

Characters:

Sam (guy from first screenshot) Tells you to come into his light house then boo he scared and he tell you story and then he follows you

Mike(kid from second screenshot) follows you and if you press Q he will draw the closest character

George(guy from fourth screenshot) just take his screwdriver to go into the sewers

Flick(flying stick from fifth screenshot) press x while near him to fly on him

Abyss(black hole from sixth screenshot) dont get caught he spawns when sam is done telling story

Tikid(tiki from seventh screenshot) dont disturb his slumber or KICK

Wacky(clown from 8th screenshot) race him to end of tire to get ticket to "carnival" (no carnival yet just big white cube to beat the game)

Easter bunny(monster from 9th screenshot) He teleports around, but dont pay attention to him. OR HE WILL ()u<h YOU

Billy(guy from the texture couldnt get screenshot too excited) He stays in the carnival and is the 1st boss! defeat him and (not here yet) bring him to the farm for his father!
